Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the immigration officer erred in concluding the marriage was not genuine
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Humanitarian and Compassionate (H&C) grounds application following denied refugee claim
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Officer questioned credibility based on interview discrepancies
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage to a Canadian citizen as basis for H&C exemption
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to consider relevant documentary evidence
Crimes.Review_Outcome: Decision set aside and remitted for redetermination
Evidence_Ignored: Medical records naming applicant as next of kin
Crimes.Application_Factor: Substantial documentary evidence supporting marital genuineness
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Procedural unfairness and unreasonableness in decision-making
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Remanded for reassessment by another officer
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Disregard of highly relevant documentary evidence
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Alleged breach due to failure to assess all evidence
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge based on reasonableness and procedural fairness
Crimes.Jurisdictional_Focus: Canadian Federal Court jurisdiction over immigration decisions
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Failure to properly analyze contradictory evidence
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to address key supporting evidence

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the officer erred in finding the marriage not genuine while ignoring critical evidence
Crimes.Procedural_Context: H&C application after failed refugee claim
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Assessment based on minor interview discrepancies
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Exemption from visa requirements based on spousal relationship
Crimes.Application_Error: Overreliance on minor inconsistencies; disregard of strong documentary proof
Crimes.Review_Outcome: Case ordered to be reassessed by new officer
Evidence_Ignored: Medical records listing applicant as next of kin
Crimes.Application_Factor: Presence of compelling evidence of genuine marriage
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Refusal of humanitarian and compassionate relief
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Perceived lack of genuineness in marriage
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Failure to weigh substantial evidence supporting marriage
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Violation due to incomplete evidentiary analysis
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Inconsistencies in interview answers deemed minor and explainable
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge on grounds of unreasonableness and procedural unfairness
Crimes.Jurisdictional_Focus: Federal Court oversight of immigration decisions
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Insufficient reasoning and omission of key evidence
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to engage with highly relevant documentation
